value.stringValue:
[Case].Primary_Ser_Tech_Contact__c.FirstName +' ' +[Case].Primary_Ser_Tech_Contact__c.LastName+'–

This is the 3rd follow-up email in reference to Service Case#'+[Case].CaseNumber+', Service Order# '+[Case].Service_Order_Number__c +' at '+[Case].Account.Name+', '+[Case].Account_City__c+'. We show that this job was scheduled for '+TEXT([Case].Current_Schedule_Date__c)+', and the service report is past due. . If you have not done so already, please reply directly back to this email with your report.

Thank you and have a great day!
'+[Case].OwnerName__c +'

Customer Service Technician | Industrials Group'
